snippet: China will cut steel capacity by 50 million tonnes and coal output by more than 150 million tonnes this year, its top economic planner said on Sunday as the world's No. 2 economy deepens efforts to tackle pollution and curb excess supply....

headline.main: No. 6 Oregon Downs Oregon State 80-59, Wins Share of Pac-12
headline.print_headline: No. 6 Oregon Downs Oregon State 80-59, Wins Share of Pac-12

lead_paragraph: China will cut steel capacity by 50 million tonnes and coal output by more than 150 million tonnes this year, its top economic planner said on Sunday as the world's No. 2 economy deepens efforts to tackle pollution and curb excess supply.
